previewArticle.title: Vancouver Whitecaps vs. New York Red Bulls | MLS Match Preview

recapArticle.title: Vancouver Whitecaps 4, New York Red Bulls 1 | MLS Match Recap

timelineItems.desc: Last year's Supporters' Shield winners, the New York Red Bulls, travel across the border to Canada to take on the Vancouver Whitecaps on opening weekend of the 2014 MLS season.
timelineItems.title: KICKOFF: Vancouver Whitecaps FC vs. New York Red Bulls

timelineItems.desc: Attempt missed. Kenny Miller (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the center of the box is too high.
timelineItems.title: Kenny Miller almost starts the game in scoring fashion

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Attempt missed. Kenny Miller (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the centre of the box is too high. Assisted by Jordan Harvey.

timelineItems.name: Steven Martins
timelineItems.text: Whitecaps season opener #whitecapsfc #redbulls #gocaps #eastsideonyourfeet #vwfc

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: RBNY give up two quality chances early on but Whitecaps don't make them pay. Defense needs to be better but midfield leaving gaps in behind.

timelineItems.name: Mike
timelineItems.text: Lloyd Sam is trolling the replacement refs. #RBNY

timelineItems.desc: Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) blasts a shot that's pushed wide by David Ousted (Vancouver Whitecaps)
timelineItems.title: Lloyd Sam blasts one that Ousted touches wide

timelineItems.name: Oz Ghent
timelineItems.text: I see now why Thierry Henry decided not to show up. Pitch in #Vancouver once again looks terrible. #VWFC really needs to invest in surface.

timelineItems.name: Alex Tremblay
timelineItems.text: Whitecaps home opener! with @scottapaloooza #caps #mls

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Péguy Luyindula.
Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by David Ousted.

timelineItems.name: Samantha M.
timelineItems.text: Lloyd Sam and Luyindula are going to great this season. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Esmir Milavic
timelineItems.text: RBNY is very active recently, let’s hope Caps will score first #VWFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: Great entry pass from Peguy, needs to sit deeper to continue to create #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Armando (New York Red Bulls).
Sebastian Fernandez (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls' attack running through Sam and Luyindula. Sam continuing to show as well as he did in preseason/late last year. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Javier Bocanegra
timelineItems.text: I like this kid Armando. He can deliver that ball up top. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Hayes Creech
timelineItems.text: Anyone else notice the 'Against modern football' sign with #RBNY logo at BC Place?! I don't get it. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Andreas Lindinger
timelineItems.text: Support by @Southsiders sounds amazing again today at @bcplace! Great to watch @WhitecapsFC's season opener, would love to be there! #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Tom Errington
timelineItems.text: Luyindula and Sam have been excellent. Full of positivity. #RBNY #VANvNY #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the center of the box is saved in the center of the goal. Assisted by
timelineItems.title: Darren Mattocks denied by Robles from close range

timelineItems.name: Jason A
timelineItems.text: Luyindula looks sharp, Sam motivated. I've seen worse starts. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Matías Laba with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: TheFaust
timelineItems.text: VAN wasted that one. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Sebastian Fernandez with a through ball.

timelineItems.name: Lucas J. Besth
timelineItems.text: Whitecaps home opener. #football #soccer #mls #whitecaps #vancouver #bcplace #underthedome #newyorkredbulls #henry

timelineItems.name: Isaac
timelineItems.text: Good on Ecks to hustle back there #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: #RBNY living very dangerously... should be down at this point

timelineItems.name: Tom Errington
timelineItems.text: Robles picking up where he left off. #BigSave #VANvNY #RBNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Back line lucky Mattocks is awful tonight. Ecks needs to not break the offside trap. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: lokilator
timelineItems.text: Here we go! @whitecapsfc #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Vendram1n
timelineItems.text: @whitecapsfc #tifo @curvacollective @southsiders #vwfc @jpulvers @teachertong

timelineItems.name: Walter Siu
timelineItems.text: 40th anniversary tifo for #VWFC. #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Péguy Luyindula (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked.

timelineItems.name: Rob Heinrichs
timelineItems.text: Great pass by Laba! Mattocks needs to finish! #VWFC #whitecapsfc

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Vancouver Whitecaps 4, New York Red Bulls 1.

timelineItems.desc: Last year's Supporters' Shield winners, the New York Red Bulls, travel across the border to Canada to take on the Vancouver Whitecaps on opening weekend of the 2014 MLS season.
timelineItems.title: HIGHLIGHTS: Vancouver Whitecaps FC vs New York Red Bulls | March 8, 2014

timelineItems.name: Chris Hoenig
timelineItems.text: This game is WIDE OPEN early. Exciting, but nerve-wracking. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Karelia Julian
timelineItems.text: Officially my favourite.... Go Whitecaps!!!!! #mls #vancouver #whitecaps #fun

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: Some sloppy turnovers early from Seba, but always works his socks off to win it back. Just came all the way back to his own box.

timelineItems.name: Melissa Bowen
timelineItems.text: Let's Go Whitecaps! #vwfc #homeopener #gocaps

timelineItems.comment: Delay over. They are ready to continue.

timelineItems.name: Darcy Green

timelineItems.name: Darcy Green
timelineItems.text: Press box shot of the TIFO on display prior to the match #VANvRBNY #VWFC #MLS http://t.co/QOPdgnegTw

timelineItems.name: Benny
timelineItems.text: Need more possession #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Alan Mathew
timelineItems.text: Nice break from hockey.  Season begins!  Go Whitecaps!  #mls #whitecaps

timelineItems.name: Robyn Corbett
timelineItems.text: Go Whitecaps Go! #VWFC #soccer #MLS #vancouver #BCPlace #whitecaps

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Ibrahim Sekagya (New York Red Bulls) because of an injury.

timelineItems.name: matt siehoff
timelineItems.text: #VWFC have so much talent this year... i could definitely see them being an elite team in the west #MLS

timelineItems.name: Esmir Milavic
timelineItems.text: Robinson is great coach, more like friend-player-coach and very detailed about his tactics.That could play great role this season #VWFC #MLS

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: @squadplayer @thegoalkeeper I'd say the TV adds 10 pounds.

timelineItems.name: Jay Minter
timelineItems.text: Kicking off their 40th Season, @whitecapsfc take to the pitch vs @NewYorkRedBulls #vwfc http://t.co/xCG4rC622g

timelineItems.name: Jay Minter
timelineItems.text: Kicking off their 40th Season, @whitecapsfc take to the pitch vs @NewYorkRedBulls #vwfc http://t.co/xCG4rC622g

timelineItems.name: Ball Side, Goal Side
timelineItems.text: Mattocks is consistently finding gaps in behind #RBNY back line. He's the main threat thus far. #VANvNY

timelineItems.name: Adaś Paweł K
timelineItems.text: These Red Bulls are playing way too unorganized at times for my liking #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Josh Mann
timelineItems.text: Lloyd Sam making some Dane Richards like plays in first half. #RBNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: boebenj
timelineItems.text: Pitchside with my new UK colleagues... #whitecaps #work #vancouver #mls #football #notsoccer #pints

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: Red Bulls happy to collapse into the middle and plug it up. Caps very narrow with Teibert and Seba playing on off wings.

timelineItems.comment: Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jonathan Steele (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Greg Boivin
timelineItems.text: Opening day! #VWFC #WhitecapsFC

timelineItems.name: Yusra

timelineItems.text: And of course a good season to all Canadians in other #MLS teams as well.

Darren Mattocks (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Tom Errington
timelineItems.text: Balls behind the back four are causing too many issues. Likes of Mattocks exploiting it too often. #VANvNY #RBNY #MLS

timelineItems.desc: Goal! Vancouver Whitecaps 1, New York Red Bulls 0. Kenny Miller (Vancouver Whitecaps) converts the penalty with a right footed shot to the bottom right corner.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: A ridiculous tackle by Armando. Already sensing the frustration from the newcomer. Right call. #RBNY #VANvNY

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: Horrible penalty to concede #RBNY

timelineItems.name: AllenMelling
timelineItems.text: #VWFC Handball Yes!

timelineItems.name: Samantha M.
timelineItems.text: You can't call a PK THAT late. wth #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Kris Kosie
timelineItems.text: Looks like an easy #handball to me #NYRB #MLS

timelineItems.name: Phil
timelineItems.text: Kenny Miller cool as you like! 1-0 #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Controversy in a #RBNY game? But of course. Handball in the box called against Eckersley after the ref initially waved a PK off.

timelineItems.name: Neil Sherwin
timelineItems.text: Yep that was a penalty, the replacement assistant got it spot on. #MLS #VANvNY

timelineItems.title: YELLOW: Jordan Harvey booked for a reckless challenge.

timelineItems.name: whitecapsfc
timelineItems.text: Kenny Miller scores the first goal of the year! #vwfc #HouseOfCaps

timelineItems.text: Unfortunate call...some bad luck...nothing a quick comeback can't fix #RBNY #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Ball Side, Goal Side
timelineItems.text: #RBNY 1-6-3 last year after conceding first. #VANvNY

timelineItems.name: Esmir Milavic
timelineItems.text: Excellent call by assistant ref on hand play by #RBNY. Not bad for a replacement ref #VWFC #MLS

timelineItems.text: That wasn’t a penalty. I’ll take it though. #VWFC #fb

timelineItems.name: Eric Giacometti
timelineItems.text: Bad, bad injury for Armando #RBNY

timelineItems.text: I'll be surprised if Armando plays on #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Kamal Hylton
timelineItems.text: I'm loving the way #VWFC is playing under Carl Robinson right now. The high pressure game is in full effect!

timelineItems.name: Jon Scott
timelineItems.text: So happy the @MLS is back #RBNY #COYRB

timelineItems.name: Randip Singh
timelineItems.text: 1-0!!!! #Vancouver #Whitecaps Vs. #NewYorkRedBulls #MLS #PenaltyShot

timelineItems.text: #VWFC scouting report must have something about shots from distance. Keep testing Robles, earning corners #RBNY #VANvNY

timelineItems.name: Nancy Lynn ✌
timelineItems.text: Thank God for Robles! #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Ogi Radoicic
timelineItems.text: First @whitecapsfc goal of the year! #soccer #mls #werebluewerewhite #ourallourhonour

timelineItems.name: jvoon
timelineItems.text: Super super Ken. Super Kenny Miller! #WhitecapsFC #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Esmir Milavic
timelineItems.text: IF #RBNY didn’t have Robles on goal today difference would be much greater. Stopped #VWFC several times #MLS

timelineItems.name: Lucky Ngamwajasat
timelineItems.text: Convey has to finish that chance. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: Halftime message HAS to stick someone on Mattocks. Too many breakaways, nearly just another one. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Vancouver Whitecaps. Conceded by Armando.

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: good attacking football from #VWFC - sure coach Robinson would be reasonably happy, midfield looking lively, Mattocks effective #MLS #RBNY

timelineItems.name: David Skilling
timelineItems.text: Back at BC Place. #Vancouver vs #NewYork #MLS With @gr8scott99

timelineItems.name: Gregory Courtois
timelineItems.text: BWP needs to come on, we need pace up top #rbny

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: Well that's a first... #VWFC keeper David Ousted hits the video board with his goal kick....

timelineItems.name: Chris Harrington
timelineItems.text: And thats why football fields shouldnt have a scoreboard hanging over the field. #thisisnthockey #VWFC #fb

timelineItems.name: Whitecaps In Match
timelineItems.text: Your halftime score. #VWFC 1, #NYRB ZERO ...I like the sounds of that

timelineItems.name: Milad Fekri
timelineItems.text: #VancouverWhitecaps #Whitecaps #NewYorkRedBulls #Vancouver #MLS

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Vancouver Whitecaps 1, New York Red Bulls 0.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Boy ... Petke loves his set plays from the start of a half. #RBNY #VWFC begin the 2nd. #VANvNY

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Would be a mistake, IMO. He has tools to be impact started on squad. #RBNY RT @mromilio I have a feeling BWP is viewed mainly as a super sub

timelineItems.name: Cristian Daniel Bogdan Sas
timelineItems.text: At it again!! @whitecapsfc #vancouver #whitecaps #vancouverwhitecaps #mls #soccer #goodtimes #sasink

timelineItems.name: Inside MLS
timelineItems.text: Vancouver coach Carl Robinson to TSN about whether Pedro Morales would play in the second half: "Definitely." #mls

timelineItems.name: lisasut
timelineItems.text: #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: there's the early goal of the season candidate from Fernandez: 2-0 #VWFC over #RBNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: Chris Harrington
timelineItems.text: HUGE GOAL!!!! #VWFC #FB

timelineItems.name: justin shirley
timelineItems.text: Damn what a goal..... :( #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dan Dickinson
timelineItems.text: And that's 2-0. Not much Robles could do to stop that laser. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Michael Heinz
timelineItems.text: You give that much space, that's what's gonna happen. #RBNY #VANvNY

timelineItems.name: jake
timelineItems.text: What a shot! Vancouver is killing us, no points today for the redbulls #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Just as I was going to comment on all the space allowed by defense, Fernandez BLASTS one past Robles. #NoPressure 2-0 #VWFC #VANvNY #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Ann Schmaltz
timelineItems.text: Fantastic strike from Seba Fernandez in 50th minute. Great "welcome to Vancouver" moment from crowd. #VWFC lead #NYRedBulls 2-0.

timelineItems.name: More Like Tim HEEL
timelineItems.text: I've already formed hard and fast opinions that will not be swayed about the entire team and the entire season. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Christian Mendonca
timelineItems.text: Where's Koskue? Can we bring back Barklage while we're at? Eck's having a rough debut #RBNY

timelineItems.name: likeyouwouldntbelieve
timelineItems.text:
First Whitecaps game
#mls #soccer #wooo

timelineItems.name: Daniel Villamil
timelineItems.text: Watching the first game of the MLS #MLS #OPENER #itallstartshere #ny #redbulls #vancouver #whitecaps

timelineItems.name: Metrohooligan101
timelineItems.text: Not sure about this backline. Petke needs to make some changes. Also needs an offensive spark like right now. #RBNY

timelineItems.text: Petke needs to make a sub #RBNY

timelineItems.name: JackBell
timelineItems.text: It's early, but are two defenders acquired from Toronto really the answer for #RBNY?

timelineItems.name: justin shirley
timelineItems.text: Loyd Sam !!! More of that please #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Have to love the confidence Sam is playing with today. One of the few bright spots for #RBNY today. #VANvNY

timelineItems.name: Ross Fletcher
timelineItems.text: Great goal by Vancouver's Sebastien Fernandez, great lay off+spin by Mattocks. Matched by quality call by @LukeWileman + @jasondevos #MLS

timelineItems.text: Loving Robles' kit! #RBNY

timelineItems.name: whitecapsfc
timelineItems.text: Let's go 'Caps! #vwfc

timelineItems.text: Corner for #RBNY follows of few minutes of their pressure on #VWFC goal but without major result #MLS

timelineItems.name: Sarah Casterline⚽
timelineItems.text: When are they gonna start pressuring and stop allowing so much space on defense? #RBNY

timelineItems.text: good hard work done by Teibert to create chance for #VWFC - #CanMNT int'l has put in a decent showing vs. #RBNY #MLS

timelineItems.text: BWP for Alexander, please. #RBNY

timelineItems.text: #RBNY already feeling the effect of Olave's absence on D -- and Cahills absence alongside Dax. Alexander back at natural CM, but not in sync

timelineItems.name: El Canaco
timelineItems.text: Whitecaps putting on a passing clinic. This is fun. #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  New York Red Bulls. Conceded by Russell Teibert.

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Wright-Phillips about to step in for #RBNY. Sub coming 10 minutes too late, IMO.

timelineItems.comment: Eric Alexander (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: Big ovation for Seba, who's off in the 73rd, replaced by his fellow Uruguayan, Nico Mezquida. Great debut for Seba. #MLS #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Wright-Phillips in for Luyindula. Good outing for Peguy. Sacrilege to say I would have subbed him in for Cahill instead? #RBNY #VANvNY

timelineItems.name: Tom Errington
timelineItems.text: Fernandez has been very good for #VWFC. Looks like he could fill some of the Camilo void. #MLS #VANvNY

timelineItems.name: thefentonian
timelineItems.text: Let the season begin! #vwfc

timelineItems.name: whitecapsfc
timelineItems.text: Pedro Morales, Nicolas Mezquida, and Johnny Leveron got skills. 5 minutes until kick-off! #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Marc Weber
timelineItems.text: The Soccer Don is in the house. Going on TSN at the half. Impressive day. Was at Seattle game, and heads to Portland this evening.

timelineItems.name: saycheesecart
timelineItems.text: Go Whitecaps!! Season opener!! #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Jay Minter
timelineItems.text: Kicking off their 40th Season, @whitecapsfc take to the pitch vs @NewYorkRedBulls #vwfc

timelineItems.comment: Armando (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Dangerous play by Nicolás Mezquida (Vancouver Whitecaps).

timelineItems.desc: Goal! Vancouver Whitecaps 3, New York Red Bulls 0. Kenny Miller (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Kenny Miller gets his brace on opening night!

timelineItems.name: Sam
timelineItems.text: First game of the season! #gocapsgo #vwfc

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: Melissa Bowen
timelineItems.text: Home of the Whitecaps #40Years #VWFC #HouseOfCaps #OurAllOurHonour @whitecapsfc

timelineItems.desc: Attempt saved. Nicolas Mezquida (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner.
timelineItems.title: Mezquida keeps the ball rolling Vancouver's way with a distance shot

timelineItems.name: Alex Campolo
timelineItems.text: Yikes. Kenny miller with a sweet one. #rbny

timelineItems.name: Jeffery Zavaglia
timelineItems.text: That was sickkkkk!!! #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Pres.Clint Dempsey
timelineItems.text: This... is... embarrassing #RBNY #NYRB

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: #GreatScot! Kenny Miller does it again with his second goal of the game to put #VWFC up 3-0! How do you like them apples!?

timelineItems.name: Glenn Williams
timelineItems.text: Just terrible. It's as if #RBNY gave up hope before KO without Olave and Henry. Petke terrible with team selection, subs.

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Nicolás Mezquida (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Pedro Morales.

timelineItems.name: Michael Booroff
timelineItems.text: Great pass by Morales. 3-0. Looking good #whitecapsfc #vwfc

timelineItems.name: Roy
timelineItems.text: A little erratic out there...it is the first game after all #RBNY #VWFC

timelineItems.comment: Offside, New York Red Bulls. Armando tries a through ball, but Péguy Luyindula is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Casual Life
timelineItems.text: Southsiders and Curva Collective (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) #mls #vwfc #tifo #supporters #football #futbol #soccer http://t.co/3UktWBUbWm

timelineItems.name: Casual Life
timelineItems.text: Southsiders and Curva Collective (Vancouver Whitecaps FC) #mls #vwfc #tifo #supporters #football #futbol #soccer http://t.co/3UktWBUbWm

timelineItems.name: J.C. Fong
timelineItems.text: Pedro Morales is ACE! #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Tyler Green
timelineItems.text: The #WhitecapsFC are certainly creating entertainment… helps that #NYRB's defending is somewhat poor

timelineItems.name: Franco Panizo
timelineItems.text: Hindsight is 20/20 but Petke got it wrong 2nite. Starting BWP made more sense - would've given #RBNY true fwd, put Peguy at CM. 33 gms to go

timelineItems.name: Esmir Milavic
timelineItems.text: Morales, Mezquida and Fernandez are great additions to #VWFC team and will play significant role this season #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Matías Laba (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Bobby Convey (New York Red Bulls) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Keith__Law
timelineItems.text: Only team worth cheering for in Vancouver right now!! #vwfc #wecanscore #learnfromthewhitecaps

timelineItems.name: Andrew Martelli
timelineItems.text: New York Red Bulls fans are finding out how overrated Eckersley is. 3-0 Whitecaps! So happy for Carl Robinson to get his first win. #MLS

timelineItems.name: Shane
timelineItems.text: This team never looked like a cohesive unit tonight. #RBNY

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Vancouver Whitecaps. Pedro Morales tries a through ball, but Nicolás Mezquida is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Eric Alexander out, Ruben Bover in. Deserved minutes - but perhaps a bit too late. #RBNY #VANvNY

timelineItems.name: KJ D
timelineItems.text: Big win. #homeopener @whitecapsfc #yvr #vancouver #mls

timelineItems.comment: Hand ball by Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps).
Attempt blocked. Nicolás Mezquida (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Russell Teibert.
Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.desc: Goal! Vancouver Whitecaps 4, New York Red Bulls 0. Pedro Morales (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the center of the box to the bottom left corner.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: Pedro Morales finishes off a fantastic sequence to put the Red Bulls to bed

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: credit to #VWFC for making most of chance vs. #RBNY without #TH14 and Olave - DP Morales looks like the real deal, very impressive #MLS

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Kekuta Manneh (Vancouver Whitecaps) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Pedro Morales.
Nicolás Mezquida (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Dax McCarty (New York Red Bulls).

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: Fantastic service in the box from Sam, but no one there to take the open ball. Great defense by O'Brien covering Peguy. #VANvNY #RBNY

timelineItems.name: Austin Moore Farrow
timelineItems.text: Morales gets his first goal for Vancouver after his first assist. Whitecaps on fire. #vanvny #mls

timelineItems.desc: Goal! Vancouver Whitecaps 4, New York Red Bulls 1. David Ousted (Vancouver Whitecaps) fumbles a contested cross with Bradley Wright-Phillips.
timelineItems.title: GOAL: David Ousted helps Bradley Wright-Phillips get one back for New York

timelineItems.name: biag
timelineItems.text: MORALES !!!! This guy is going to be a game breaker for the Caps this season #VWFC #TSN #MLS #StrengthInNumbers #OurAllOurHonour

timelineItems.name: Sophia
timelineItems.text: That's how you do it! Vote for Pedro! #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: 4-0 #VWFC. Again, #RBNY defense in shambles. What more can be said? #VANvNY

timelineItems.name: Jason Saghini
timelineItems.text: That Reo-Coker dribble move to set up the Morales goal was legit #MLS #ItAllStartsHere #VANvNY

timelineItems.name: Rahul Vaidyanath
timelineItems.text: bad judgment from Ousted and #VWFC concede a consolation goal to #RBNY #MLS

timelineItems.name: El Canaco
timelineItems.text: No shut out for Ousted. But 4-1 destruction of #RBNY. Whitecaps are legit. #VWFC

timelineItems.name: Mike
timelineItems.text: Liking Lloyd Sam's crossing. There's that. #RBNY

timelineItems.name: JayNyarko
timelineItems.text: Vancouver Whitecaps are gonna be winners this year! #mls #whitecaps

timelineItems.comment: Attempt blocked. Lloyd Sam (New York Red Bulls) right footed shot from the left side of the six yard box is blocked. Assisted by Bradley Wright-Phillips.

timelineItems.name: Dave Martinez
timelineItems.text: *NOTE: Sam playing on left mid. That is an area he manned heavily while with Charlton. Again - one of the few #RBNY bright spots #VANvNY

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ibrahim Sekagya (New York Red Bulls).
Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Anna Reid
timelineItems.text: Camilo who? #VWFC #whitecapsfc #Vancouver #soccer

timelineItems.name: Jon Howard
timelineItems.text: .@WhitecapsFC put up 4 on @NewYorkRedBulls in front of a sell out crowd of 21,000. They've sold out every home opener since joining #MLS

timelineItems.name: suzannejnorman
timelineItems.text:
It's a win for the Caps!!!
#whitecapsfc #mls

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Nigel Reo-Coker (Vancouver Whitecaps) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Second Half ends, Vancouver Whitecaps 4, New York Red Bulls 1.

timelineItems.name: Rob Harmer
timelineItems.text: Vancouver Southsiders doing their thing for new DP Pedro Morales scoring his first goal in a #VWFC… http://t.co/DXAs1deA1b

timelineItems.name: Vancouver Whitecaps
timelineItems.text: And that's the game folks and what a game it was! #VWFC take down @NewYorkRedBulls 4-1 in the #HouseOfCaps. RT if you are as pumped as us!
